name: No Brake - Ludum Dare 49
description:
In No Brake, you are in control of an unstable spaceship in a frenetic pursuit with space law enforcement spaceships. You will have control of the left and right movement of your spaceship, while its speed will be in constant acceleration. Each collision will slow you down, but luckily you can also use speed boosts to quickly gain a lot of speed ! Slow down too much and you'll get caught !

WARNING : This game contains fast flashing images and lights. It may potentially cause discomfort for certain players.

Project made by ECV Lille Game students
Dasweez was our Texture/UI Artist and Level Builder ///
Yogimeis was our 3D Modeler and Texture Artist ///
Chap (François Chapoule) was our Tech Artist and Game Designer ///
Leogml was our Developper and Game Designer
